text: Ellon is a town in Aberdeenshire, Scotland, approximately 16 miles north of Aberdeen, lying on the River Ythan (pronounced eye-than) which has one of the few undeveloped river estuaries on the eastern coast of Scotland. It is in the ancient region of Formartine. ==Famous people from Ellon== * Paul Sturrock, footballer * Teddy Scott, footballer, coach and kit man for Aberdeen * Evelyn Glennie, percussionist == References == == Other websites == * Ellon Tourism Group website * Ellon AAC Website * Ellon Academy website * Ellon Webcam, local picture galleries and historic info Category:Towns in Aberdeenshire
title: Ellon, Aberdeenshire
